title: 18-23歲嘅小朋友們點樣受惠於BNO二代英國移居計劃

replies.msg:
有好多protester依家係讀緊university，所以佢地一定喺above the age of 18 而不能fulfil 所謂dependant嘅要求。你地覺得after all英國會唔會ammend啲requirements定係只可以去加拿大。

利申：Currently applying for Canadian PR through common law marriage and I have been in Canada for over a couple years. And my Chinese is kinda suck.
